mapper.insert: insert into injection_label_catalog (CATALOG_ID, CATALOG_CODE,CATALOG_NAME, PARENT_ID, LEVEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{catalogCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update injection_label_catalog set CATALOG_CODE = #{catalogCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CATALOG_NAME = #{catalogName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PARENT_ID = #{parentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, LEVEL_ID = #{levelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select CATALOG_ID,CATALOG_CODE, CATALOG_NAME, PARENT_ID, LEVEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_catalog where CATALOG_ID = #{catalogId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
select CATALOG_ID,CATALOG_CODE, CATALOG_NAME, PARENT_ID, LEVEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_catalog

select CATALOG_ID,CATALOG_CODE, CATALOG_NAME, PARENT_ID, LEVEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_catalog where LEVEL_ID = #{level}

select CATALOG_ID,CATALOG_CODE, CATALOG_NAME, PARENT_ID, LEVEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from injection_label_catalog where PARENT_ID = #{parentId}
